title: 3.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Get the height of 30 students as input from the user and store them in a list. Write a pseudocode and JavaScript program to display the average height, the height of the tallest person, and the height of the shortest person.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
